title: Adelaide: flowers and festival
creator_credit: South Australian Government Tourist Bureau, G Shepherd and J.A. Correll
brief_description: Scenes in Adelaide showing events in the biennial Festival of Arts 1968. The accent is on Flower Day and its associated pageantry and processions. Snippets of the Festival of Arts demonstrate Adelaide’s attractiveness as a festival venue during vintage time when the weather is still sunny. Narrated by Peter Wells.
